Hi, my name is Bruno Mioto, I'm a biologist, currently doing my PhD in Ecology of Inland Water Ecosystems ([PEA-UEM](https://en.pea.uem.br/)) and I study **fish phylogeography**!

I have experience with data analysis and chart creation, I love to create new **R packages** and work as a **data visualization freelancer**!

See my freelance profile here: [**Upwork**](https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~01b609b6016a32f6c6)

And my portfolio here: [**Behance**](https://www.behance.net/gallery/136021485/Data-Visualization-Portfolio)

I always seek to bring the right information in a simpler way to society.
